import React from "react" const PackageSettings = ({ isPackagePDFs, setIsPackagePDFs }) => { const handleRadioChange = (event) => { setIsPackagePDFs(event.target.value === "yes") } return (
{isPackagePDFs ? (

All PDFs will be packaged into a single document

) : (

PDFs will be stamped individually

)}
) } export default PackageSettings
